comments.en: toner & drum in one, 7000 and 14000 pages, 14000 costs 200DM

parallel.commandset: PCL 5 Emulation, PostScript Level 2 Emulation, NPAP, PJL

comments.en: Built by Lexmark, similar to Optra R/R+. PPD driver lexoptra.ppd available at Lexmark's web site in the file PS_PPD.TAR, includes support for about all printer specialties. Printcap filters only available for generic 600 dpi PS printer, as far as I know. Supports also HP PCL 5, emulates Laserjet 4.
